titleInfo.title: Representations of Algebras. Proceedings of the Third International Conference on Representations of Algebras, held in Puebla, Mexico, August 4 - 8, 1980

bibliographicCitation.chicago: Happel, Dieter, and Ringel, Claus Michael. 1981. “Construction of tilted algebras”. In Representations of Algebras.
